changes: Fix bug where deleting/editing direct messages would crash the extension.

Due to a Discord API limitation, active threads that have had the first message deleted are unable to be found by Discrub for the time being. (However archiving a thread, then finding it on Discrub, and then unarchiving it in a separate tab will allow you to edit/delete messages for this specific scenario).
Add r/discrub subreddit link to General Information tab.
Fix bug where active filters did not affect the messages exported.
Fix bug where message filters did not reset behind the scenes.
Rename 'About' tab to 'General Information', refactor layout.
Add ability to export to the following file formats: HTML, PDF, and JSON.
Add ability to filter messages by attachment name.
Extension created along with various bug fixes.
